name: JetCrap
description:
A micro game made for the 62nd 1 hour game jam, the theme of the jam was: JETPACK. The game is about a Jetpack with a crappy design that makes it difficult to maneuver.

Use Space to engage the main engine, left/right arrow keys or A/D to activate the side thursters. You'll need all three for the jetpack to take off.

As sad as may can be, I spent more than an hour making this "game", almost half of the time spent in the poor programmer art you can see. But anyways I had fun doing it so it was worth it.

Enjoy :D
